entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
